pages.text: $(li)The Pillagers are the lowest ranking soldiers of the Illagers.$(br)$(li)They are armed with $(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbows$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be found in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_tower)Illager Towers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_fort)Illager Forts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_mine)Illager Mines$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/mansion)Mansions$(/l), in a $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raid$(/l) and in a $(l:patchouli:illagers/patrol)Patrol$(/l) around the Overworld too.
